app.kobo-safe: GotruckSafe is our bespoke self insurance solution that provides insurance cover for every single trip on Gotruckâ€™s platform. This product offers 80% cost reduction on insurance premiums.

app.estimator-text: How much does gotrucking cost in your city? Calculate a fare estimate for your next trip. Simply enter a pickup location and destination to get started.
